Revise local government ballot issue laws

Study resolution on the creation or alteration of local government entities

Allowing emergency permitting authority during an emergency

Allowing for streamlined public hearing notice process when revising zoning

Exempt subdivision, water/sewer plans from environmental review
Allow revocation of agricultural covenant on lands annexed into municipality
